mapper.sql: id, create_by, create_time, modified_by, modified_time, management_unit, skill_shaft_count, safety_information, technology_status, open_date, guarantee_period, xid
mapper.insert: insert into mro_line_technology_status (id, create_by, create_time, modified_by, modified_time, management_unit , skill_shaft_count, safety_information, technology_status, open_date, guarantee_period, xid, guarantee_message, reorganize) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{managementUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{skillShaftCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{safetyInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{technologyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{guaranteePeriod,jdbcType=DATE}, #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{guaranteeMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{reorganize,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update mro_line_technology_status
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
management_unit = #{managementUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
skill_shaft_count = #{skillShaftCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
safety_information = #{safetyInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
technology_status = #{technologyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
open_date = #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE},
guarantee_period = #{guaranteePeriod,jdbcType=DATE},
xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
guarantee_message = #{guaranteeMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
reorganize = #{reorganize,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_line_technology_status set create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, management_unit = #{managementUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_shaft_count = #{skillShaftCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safety_information = #{safetyInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, technology_status = #{technologyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_date = #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, guarantee_period = #{guaranteePeriod,jdbcType=DATE}, xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, guarantee_message = #{guaranteeMessage,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, reorganize = #{reorganize,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update mro_line_technology_status set create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_by = #{modifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, management_unit = #{managementUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, skill_shaft_count = #{skillShaftCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, safety_information = #{safetyInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, technology_status = #{technologyStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_date = #{openDate,jdbcType=DATE}, guarantee_period = #{guaranteePeriod,jdbcType=DATE}, xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.sql: lts.id as lts_id, lts.create_by,lts. create_time,lts. modified_by, lts.modified_time,lts. management_unit,lts.skill_shaft_count, lts.safety_information, lts.technology_status, lts.open_date, lts.guarantee_period,lts.xid,lts.guarantee_message, lts.reorganize, ax.id as ax_id,ax.xiangmuleixing

mro_line_technology_status lts left outer join mro_line_technology_status_xiangmutype ltsx on lts.id=ltsx.line_technology_status_id left outer join mro_anzhuangtiaoshi_xiangmutype ax on ax.id=ltsx.xiangmutype_id
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(t.tlj_name, '') AS tluName, IFNULL(SUM(ltss.lenght), 0) AS lengthMileage, IFNULL(COUNT(c.cid), 0) AS stationQuantity, IFNULL(t.tlj_miaoshu, '') AS runSituation FROM mro_tieluju t INNER JOIN mro_dianwuduan d on t.tid = d.tlj_dwd_id INNER JOIN mro_xianduan x on d.did = x.dwd_xd_id INNER JOIN mro_chezhan c on xid = c.xd_cz_id LEFT OUTER JOIN mro_line_technology_status_station ltss on c.cid = ltss.cid WHERE t.tid = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT IFNULL(d.dwd_name, '') AS dwnName, IFNULL(SUM(ltss.lenght), 0) AS lengthMileage, IFNULL(COUNT(c.cid), 0) AS stationQuantity, IFNULL(d.dwd_miaoshu, '') AS runSituation FROM mro_dianwuduan d INNER JOIN mro_xianduan x on d.did = x.dwd_xd_id INNER JOIN mro_chezhan c on xid = c.xd_cz_id LEFT OUTER JOIN mro_line_technology_status_station ltss on c.cid = ltss.cid WHERE d.did = #{did,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT IFNULL(x.xd_name, '') AS xdName, IFNULL(SUM(ltss.lenght), 0) AS lengthMileage, IFNULL(COUNT(c.cid), 0) AS stationQuantity, IFNULL(x.xd_miaoshu, '') AS runSituation, IFNULL(SUM(c.tongXinBianMaGuiDaoNumber + c.tongXinBianMaZhanNeiOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianOneToOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianNToOneGuiDaoNumber + c.jiDianNToOneSheBeiNumber + c.tongXinBianMaDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianNToOneDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianJiaShiGuiDaoNumber), 0) AS totalTrackQuduanQuantity, IFNULL(SUM(c.jiDianJiaShiDianMaHuaSheBeiNumber + c.jiDianDianMaHuaNumber), 0) AS dianmahuaQuantity FROM mro_xianduan x INNER JOIN mro_chezhan c on x.xid = c.xd_cz_id LEFT OUTER JOIN mro_line_technology_status_station ltss on c.cid = ltss.cid WHERE x.xid = #{xid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
